channel.title: crypto on AdelaideB9 Blog
channel.description: Recent content in crypto on AdelaideB9 Blog

item.title: A Based Crypto Challenge - DuckCTF 2023
item.description: There's not much to say here other than this challenge is BASED.

item.title: Homebrewed Block Cipher - DuckCTF 2023
item.description: I have finally created my own, completely secure, cipher. I am so confident that I will even allow you to encrypt your own data with it.

item.title: Not So Standard Substitution Cipher - DuckCTF 2023
item.description: I made a machine to implement a substitution cipher. The only issue is that it seemed to encrypt everything in sight, including my flag and all other random stuff. Each line in the attached file is a new piece of encoded information. Please save my flag! The flag will not be encased in quack{...}, but it will be the only reasonable text.

item.title: Non-textual Troubles - UACTF 2022
item.description: After messing up the implementation, I have decided that this is a feature and not a flaw.
